LEGAL_COPY.FREE_OFFER_DETAILS: OFFER DETAILS: Activate an {{packageType}} trial and get your first {{trialTerm}} {{monthsPluralized}} for {{trialPrice}}. A credit card is required for this offer. After the initial term, service will continue every month thereafter and your credit card will automatically be charged the regular price (currently {{monthlyRenewalPrice}} per month and subject to change upon proper notice) for as long as you choose to remain a subscriber. Fees and taxes apply. A Music Royalty and Administrative Fee (MRF) of 20.07% applies. The plan you choose is for an indeterminate term and therefore services will continue until you cancel. To cancel you may call us at 1-833-838-7846. All terms, fees, content, and features subject to change. SiriusXM Canada reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time. The offer cannot be combined with any other offer and is available for new subscribers only. Channel lineup varies by package. See our Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy for complete terms.

LEGAL_COPY.PICK_A_PLAN_OFFER_DETAILS: OFFER DETAILS: Select and purchase either an {{packageName_1}}, {{packageName_2}} or {{packageName_3}} subscription plan for {{trialPrice}} for your first {{trialTerm}} {{monthsPluralized}} of service. A credit card is required for this offer. After the initial term, service will continue every month thereafter for your selected plan, and your credit card will automatically be charged the current regular price for as long as you remain a subscriber: {{packageName_1}} (currently {{renewalPriceWithCents_1}}/month), {{packageName_2}} (currently {{renewalPriceWithCents_2}}/month) or {{packageName_3}} (currently {{renewalPriceWithCents_3}}/month). Prices subject to change with proper notice. Fees and taxes apply. A Music Royalty and Administrative Fee (MRF) of 20.07% applies. To cancel you may call us at 1-833-838-7846. All terms, fees, content, and features subject to change. SiriusXM Canada reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time. The offer cannot be combined with any other offer and is available for new subscribers only. Channel lineup varies by package. See our Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy for complete terms.
